data:
## constant_createProgressbar
> `const` **createProgressbar**: `WidgetFactory`\<[`ProgressbarWidget`](#progressbarwidget)\>


Create a Progressbar with given config props

### Param

an optional progressbar config

### Returns

a ProgressbarWidget

## function_getProgressbarDefaultConfig
> **getProgressbarDefaultConfig**(): [`ProgressbarProps`](#progressbarprops)


Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Progressbar config

### Returns

[`ProgressbarProps`](#progressbarprops)

the default Progressbar config

## interface_ProgressbarContext

Represents the context for a Progressbar widget.
This interface is used to define the context object that is passed to the Progressbar widget.

### Properties

#### api

> **api**: `object`


all the api functions to interact with the widget

***

#### directives

> **directives**: [`ProgressbarDirectives`](#progressbardirectives)


directives to be used on html elements in the template of the widget or in the slots

***

#### state

> **state**: [`ProgressbarState`](#progressbarstate)


the state of the widget

## interface_ProgressbarDirectives

Interface representing directives for a progress bar component.

### Properties

#### ariaDirective

> **ariaDirective**: `Directive`


A directive to be applied to the main container that handles aria attributes.

## interface_ProgressbarProps

Interface representing the properties for the Progressbar component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`


If `true`, animates a striped progressbar.
Takes effect only for browsers supporting CSS3 animations, and if `striped` is `true`.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`


The aria label.

##### Default Value

`'Progressbar'`

***

#### ariaValueTextFn

> **ariaValueTextFn**: (`value`, `minimum`, `maximum`) => `string` \| `undefined`


Return the value for the 'aria-valuetext' attribute.

##### Parameters

###### value

`number`

current value

###### minimum

`number`

minimum value

###### maximum

`number`

maximum value

##### Returns

`string` \| `undefined`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => undefined
```

***

#### children

> **children**: `SlotContent`\<[`ProgressbarContext`](#progressbarcontext)\>


Label of the progress.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### height

> **height**: `string`


Height of the progressbar, can be any valid css height value.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### max

> **max**: `number`


The maximum value.

##### Default Value

`100`

***

#### min

> **min**: `number`


The minimum value.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### striped

> **striped**: `boolean`


If `true`, shows a striped progressbar.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### structure

> **structure**: `SlotContent`\<[`ProgressbarContext`](#progressbarcontext)\>


Global template for the Progressbar.

***

#### type

> **type**: [`BSContextualClass`](../types#bscontextualclass) \| `undefined`


Type of the progressbar, following bootstrap types.

***

#### value

> **value**: `number`


The current value.

##### Default Value

`0`

## interface_ProgressbarState

Represents the state of a Progressbar component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`


If `true`, animates a striped progressbar.
Takes effect only for browsers supporting CSS3 animations, and if `striped` is `true`.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`


The aria label.

##### Default Value

`'Progressbar'`

***

#### ariaValueText

> **ariaValueText**: `string` \| `undefined`


The aria value text.

***

#### children

> **children**: `SlotContent`\<[`ProgressbarContext`](#progressbarcontext)\>


Label of the progress.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### finished

> **finished**: `boolean`


`true` if the value has reached its maximum value.

***

#### height

> **height**: `string`


Height of the progressbar, can be any valid css height value.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### max

> **max**: `number`


The maximum value.

##### Default Value

`100`

***

#### min

> **min**: `number`


The minimum value.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### percentage

> **percentage**: `number`


Percentage of completion.

***

#### started

> **started**: `boolean`


`true` if the value is above its minimum value.

***

#### striped

> **striped**: `boolean`


If `true`, shows a striped progressbar.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### structure

> **structure**: `SlotContent`\<[`ProgressbarContext`](#progressbarcontext)\>


Global template for the Progressbar.

***

#### type

> **type**: [`BSContextualClass`](../types#bscontextualclass) \| `undefined`


Type of the progressbar, following bootstrap types.

***

#### value

> **value**: `number`


The current value.

##### Default Value

`0`

## type alias_ProgressbarWidget
> **ProgressbarWidget** = `Widget`\<[`ProgressbarProps`](#progressbarprops), [`ProgressbarState`](#progressbarstate), `object`, [`ProgressbarDirectives`](#progressbardirectives)\>


Represents a Progressbar widget.

This type defines the structure of a Progressbar widget, including its properties, state, and directives.
